footer.tagline: Frequency Healing Studio - built for calm, focus, and restorative rituals.
footer.disclaimer: Audio is generated client-side. Wellness support only; not medical advice.

home.title: Design healing sound journeys with guided, calming visual space.
home.description: Build intentional frequency sessions, refine advanced audio movement, and enter a responsive meditative canvas that stays soft on focus.
home.noAccount: No account needed for live playback.
home.firstTimeBody: Open the studio, press Play, and start with sacred geometry immediately.
home.wellnessDisclaimer: Healing outcomes vary by context and individual response. Use as a wellness companion, not medical treatment.

journeyPoints.title: Set intention
journeyPoints.description: Choose frequencies for grounding, heart coherence, focus, or sleep support.

journeyPoints.title: Shape your field
journeyPoints.description: Layer rhythm, modulation, binaural offset, and ambient texture in one studio flow.

journeyPoints.title: Enter resonance
journeyPoints.description: Pair the session with visual atmospheres tuned for immersive, low-distraction attention.

home.quickStartHeading: Enter your session in under 10 seconds
quickStartSteps: Tap Play with the default sacred geometry visualization.
Adjust only what you feel: frequencies, rhythm, or ambience.
Open publishing tools later if you want to save or share.

create.title: Compose a healing frequency session.
create.description: Keep the controls minimal during practice: press Atmosphere in the lower-right corner to randomize, lock, or disable the animated background.

mixStyles.manualDescription: Direct: plays only the exact frequencies you selected, with no extra ladder layers.
mixStyles.golden432Description: Golden: expands each tone using a golden-ratio ladder for a fuller, immersive field.

share.listenToSession: Listen to this healing frequency session.

summary.allAdvancedModulesOff: All advanced modules are currently off.

help.adaptiveJourneyText: Guides beat offsets through brain-state phases over time. Optional mic adaptation can nudge beat targets using rough breathing cadence estimates.
help.binauralModeText: Binaural mode sends slightly different frequencies to left and right channels to create a perceived beat. Headphones are recommended.
help.breathSyncText: Guides breathing toward coherence around 5-6 breaths/min. Mic mode infers cadence; manual mode runs without permissions.
help.frequencyStackText: Your active tones live here. Each one has its own volume, and the stack is saved into audio config.
help.harmonicFieldText: Stacks curated Solfeggio sets with optional interference layers and spatial motion. This is an experiential sound design mode, not a biomedical treatment.
help.intentionImprintText: Creative ritual mode that maps text intention to gentle modulation settings. This is not a medical claim and should be treated as reflective sound design.
help.modulationSweepText: LFO adds cyclic pitch movement. Sweep shifts tones toward a target frequency over a set duration and curve.
help.rhythmPatternText: The step grid gates sound on and off. BPM and subdivision control timing, and randomize creates a valid new pattern.
help.roomTunerText: Harmonize layers partials over your room's dominant tones. Cleanse mode is a bounded counter-tone prototype and does not guarantee noise cancellation.
help.visualizationLayersText: Stack multiple visual renderers, reorder them, and blend with different modes. Each layer has its own color and motion controls.
help.voiceBioprintText: This is a wellness personalization tool and not a medical diagnostic system. Capture quality depends on room noise and mic quality.

ui.adaptiveHeadphonesTip: Confirm headphones in Adaptive Journey settings before starting playback.
ui.advancedSoundDescription: Rhythm pattern, modulation + sweep, binaural mode, and adaptive journeys.
ui.analyzeToGenerateShareText: Analyze an intention to generate share text.
ui.binauralTip: Binaural mode is optimized for headphones and gentle listening environments.
ui.cleanseExperimentalNotice: Cleanse mode is experimental. Results depend on room acoustics, speaker placement, and microphone quality.
ui.globalBackgroundFollowsAudio: The global background atmosphere also follows this audio energy while playback is running.
ui.guestCompositionNotice: You are composing as a guest. Sign in whenever you want to save and publish this session.
ui.harmonicFieldTip: Tip: Start with 50-70% intensity, then add motion if you want more stereo depth.
ui.intentionExperimentalNotice: Experimental ritual mode. Treat outcomes as reflective support, not scientific proof or clinical treatment.
ui.intentionPlaceholder: Example: I welcome calm focus and grounded energy.
ui.iosTip: iOS tip: Tap Play once to unlock audio. If sound is muted, turn off the side silent switch.
ui.mobileHiddenByDefault: Hidden by default on mobile for a calmer starter flow.
ui.mp3Warning: MP3 export is optimized for shorter sessions (up to {seconds}s). Reduce duration or choose WAV for longer renders.
ui.noLayersConfigured: No layers configured for this visual mode.
ui.publishingCollapsedDescription: Open when you want to save, share, or sign in.
ui.publishingExpandedDescription: Set title, export options, and sharing details.
ui.quantumIntentionDisclaimerContinue: Continue only if you understand this mode is for personal ritual and creative listening.
ui.quantumIntentionDisclaimerDescription: Quantum Intention Imprinting is an experimental reflective tool. It does not diagnose, treat, or cure any medical condition and should not replace professional care.
ui.quickResonanceDescription: Start listening instantly, then refine only what you need. Publishing tools stay tucked away until you ask for them.
ui.saveSessionModalDescription: Create a free account to save, publish, and revisit your healing compositions anytime. Your draft is stored locally so you can pick up right where you left off.
ui.savedPrivateHint: This composition is private. You can open it directly, but it will not appear in Discover.
ui.savedPublicShareHint: Share your public composition link, post it socially, or copy an embed snippet.
ui.selectedFrequenciesDescription: Add arbitrary frequencies ({min}-{max}Hz), then use harmonics, modulation, and rhythm shaping.
ui.startPlaybackForBreathPacing: Start playback to activate breath pacing.
ui.sympatheticResonanceDescription: Analyze room frequencies and blend adaptive response tones in Harmonize or Cleanse mode.
ui.tapPresetToBegin: Tap a preset below to begin.
ui.title: Title
ui.toneSelected: {count, plural, one {# tone selected.} other {# tones selected.}}
ui.videoExport50mbNote: Video export is limited to 50MB per file. MP4 is used when the browser supports MP4 recording; otherwise export falls back to WebM.
ui.visualsAudioReactiveNote: Visuals are audio-reactive and auto-downgrade on constrained devices for stable frame times.
ui.voiceBioprintDescription: Record ~5 seconds, analyze your vocal spectrum, then auto-suggest supporting frequencies.
ui.voiceBioprintDisclaimerCheckbox: I understand the Voice Bioprint wellness disclaimer
ui.voiceBioprintNotice: Use for personal audio tuning only. Do not interpret this as medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
ui.roomScanPrompt: Run room scan to generate a live frequency map.
ui.voicePortraitCapturePrompt: Capture a short voice sample to generate a personalized frequency portrait.

meditation.description: Settles into stable alpha/theta meditation depth.

creative.description: Alternates alpha/theta and returns to active ideation.

heart_bridge.description: Center-weighted field for emotional balance sessions.

release_reset.name: Release + Reset
release_reset.description: Lower-stack release field with gentle upward lift.

clarity_focus.name: Clarity Focus
clarity_focus.description: Upper harmonic blend tuned for clear, active listening.

spiral_overtone.name: Spiral Overtone
spiral_overtone.description: Layered overtone stack with broader harmonic spread.

earth_sky.name: Earth + Sky
earth_sky.description: Contrast between low anchor and high overtone shimmer.
